title: Interpretation of a dream about the arrival of a male child

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a male child by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that if you see a male child in a dream, this shows the number of problems that the dreamer faces in his life, but they will be solved soon, God willing. And if he sees a girl who is considering the arrival of a male child, this is a sign that she will face some problems and difficulties. In her academic life, such as not passing some exams, but in the end she will succeed and reach her goal. And if a married woman sees in a dream the arrival of a male child. This is a sign that she has some problems with her husband’s family, but these problems will be solved thanks to her husband, who will bring them closer and end these problems. And God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman who has not given birth sees in her dream the arrival of a male child, these are visions. The praiseworthy one who promised to solve her pregnancy problem soon and God will bless her with a baby soon, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Ibn Sirin believes that an unmarried girl sees a baby girl in her dream. It is a sign that she will marry a good man and will treat her well. As for seeing a baby boy in a dream, it is a sign that she She will face some problems and difficulties in her life because of a person close to her life, but these problems will be solved thanks to God Almighty. What if an unmarried girl who is late in marriage sees a male child in her dream. This is a sign of her close marriage to a good man with good morals, but she must She chooses well and does not rush in her decision. See also: Interpretation of a boy’s dream for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about a new baby for a married womanIf a married woman sees a male child in a dream. This is a sign that she will face some problems in her married life, but these problems will end soon, and she will have a good relationship. With her husband again. It is possible that the dream indicates that she will soon give birth to a child, which will help her solve all the problems in her marital relationship, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If she sees a male child in her dream, she will wear beautiful and discreet clothes. This will be a sign of spacious living. Which she will get through inheritance or project, which will make her get a lot of money. And if he sees in a dream a married woman who has children with a newborn male. This is a sign that she faces some consequences with her children as a result of some of them disobeying. Which leads her to sadness because she desires To live a happy life full of joy. What if she sees in her dream that the newborn is pale and appears sick. This is a sign that she is facing a serious illness or evidence of losing someone she loves, which causes her sadness, and God is Great and All-Knowing. It is possible for a married woman to see in a dream, a child Male. The stress and anxiety that afflicts her because of her children, and that she fears for them in that life and worries about them in the future. But do not be afraid because God Almighty protects them and cares for them. Interpretation of a dream about a male baby for a pregnant woman. Many dream interpreters believe that seeing the gender of a newborn baby in a dream is the opposite of seeing A male baby. The evidence that she will give birth to a baby girl and seeing a baby girl is evidence that she will give birth to a baby boy, God willing. Seeing a male baby in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting engaged to someone I know for single and pregnant women in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about engagement by someone I know. Engagement is one of the rights that God Almighty has assigned to man as a first step that must be taken before marriage, and when we see this matter in a dream, it is a praiseworthy vision that portends goodness, although there are some cases that indicate and indicate that it is a warning to the dreamer and can cause confusion. For some women, they resort to searching for the correct and reliable interpretation that scientists and translators explain about this dream. We have prepared our article today to provide an interpretation of a dream about engagement by someone I know.Interpretation of a dream about engagement from someone I knowThe engagement of a young woman with someone she knows is one of the most beautiful dreams for her, and she hopes that this will happen on the ground and in reality, and this occasion will bring happiness to the girl and her family, and when If she sees her in a dream, she begins her journey by searching for the symbols that indicate her: If the dreamer is an unmarried girl and sees this dream, this is evidence that she will truly be engaged to him and it also confirms that this young man has feelings for her in real life. Seeing her in a dream shows her connection With this person, this is a sign that this girl will be blessed with this groom who will change her next life. It means seeing her engaged to someone she knows and loves, and this indicates her need for self-control, love, and tenderness. But if she is very happy and cheerful, this indicates her success and the doors of nourishment and kindness will be opened for her. And if she sees the opposite, this indicates the emergence of problems and disagreements. I dreamed that I was engaged to someone I know in the country. Scientists also explained that this dream indicates the arrival of good news and happiness to the monarch, but some cases may warn him of evil. This vision indicates the girl’s desire to get engaged. And marriage. It also indicates that the date of her engagement to a handsome and kind young man is approaching and will make her days full of happiness. And seeing her engaged to a young man who was working in trade, this indicates that she will be his business partner in the future. This means that seeing her engaged to someone in a dream, this indicates her desire In caring for her behind that young man. If she is an employee and he is a colleague at her work, this means that she will be promoted in her work and she will have a high and great status. See also: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from one place to another in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about an engagement from someone I know to a divorced woman. It indicates the engagement and marriage of a divorced woman. It has many different connotations and interpretations and generally indicates that it is a second opportunity to get married and start a new life full of love and happiness. We will learn about these clues as follows: This dream brings her good things and changes for the better and for the better, God willing. And if the woman who sees the dream is very happy when she sees the dream, then this is good news about her marriage to someone who will compensate her for her past life and fill her coming days with happiness. And if she sees herself She buys a dress for her engagement from a young man she knows, as this is a sign of the obstacles and problems that she will face on her way in the coming days. This means that she saw herself wearing an engagement ring and was very happy, as evidence that she has entered into a new life. See also

title: A detailed interpretation of the letter Y in a dream by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The dream of our master of Nabulsi, our master Yahya, peace be upon him, came to life in a dream is a symbol of piety and piety, and he is infallible from sins and committing indecency. He is a human being contrary to his morals and circumstances, and it is good news for any good, God willing, and God knows best. A dream about Yunus of Nabulsi, as you see in a dream, our master Yunus, peace be upon him, is one of the signs that indicate haste and haste. Making a decision. The priest must reconsider his assumptions well, and think again and be slow in making his decisions. It is news of the disappearance of worries and problems and almost relief, and God knows best. The dream of our master Jacob of Nabulsi. See the point of our master Jacob, peace be upon him, in strength, abundance of food, polygamy, and many children. It is sadness. Great, followed by greater joy and a sign of obedience and devotion. A dream of our Lord Joseph of Nabulsi. As for the interpretation? Seeing our Lord Joseph in a dream is a sign of assuming power, influence, and ownership. It also indicates that he will be exposed to many difficulties, challenges, and sorrows, losing money, children, family, and self, and being seriously exposed to injustice, but he will receive a great blessing. And great livelihood and compensation from God Almighty, and he is better on the journey. And freedom from tyranny, and God knows best. Jasmine in a dream for NabulsiJasmine is one of the symbols that indicate joy, kindness, and pleasant events. It is a relief close to the worries and death of sorrows. It is good news of marriage in a single person’s dream and a sign of certainty from great doubt, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about rubies for Nablus Sapphire is one of the praiseworthy symbols that often heralds joy and good news. Seeing a cut ruby ​​means a lot of money or knowledge that benefits him or profit from trade, and a ruby ​​in a poor man’s dream is money. She is a woman, and she is a salvation for the sick, and the red ruby ​​is a symbol of a hard-hearted woman, and God knows best. Seeing the hand in Nabulsi’s dream. The long arm in the dream is a victory over enemies, and the outstretched arm is an increase in expenses, and walking on the arm is a need in the dreamer’s mind, and the arm is a symbol of human support in life, and God knows best. We conclude today’s topic and welcome With the questions at the end of the article specifying the social position of the opinion, to answer them quickly.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a full haircut in a dream and its meaning for a married, single, or pregnant woman?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing full curly hair in a dream? It is said that seeing full hair in a dream is full of frightening dreams that may cause the dreamer to suffocate and suffer mentally when they see them. Many people asked us questions and said, “I want to interpret a dream about someone cutting my hair.” Some of them said, “I don’t want to.” What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting my son’s hair, and what is the interpretation of a dream about cutting my daughter’s hair? This article will answer all questions related to the interpretation of dreams. Leading scholars interpret hair as “interpretation of dreams.” Seeing the curly hair of an ordinary woman in a dream, full. When a girl sees herself in a dream completely, then when she cuts her hair, which shows her femininity, this indicates her dissatisfaction with her appearance, her self-confidence, as well as her feeling of sadness and suffocation. And when she sees in a dream the completely cut part of her hair, which is impure and carries dirt, then this is a sign that troubles, relief from sadness, and alleviation of sadness is a sign that God knows best. As for the interpretation of a complete haircut in a dream for a woman in general, in a complete dream, this indicates the end of a romantic relationship, perhaps An engagement or love relationship, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a hairband in a complete dream for elderly, married, and pregnant women? Why do you dream of a married woman cutting her hair? It is said that the interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s hair being cut indicates that she will enter a period in which she will neither become pregnant nor give birth, and God knows best. And if She saw in a dream that all her hair is growing and her hair has a beautiful and unusual aesthetic appearance, so this indicates the approach of pregnancy, and the devil knows best. Getting a full haircut in a dream for a married woman is a sign of separation and divorce, God forbid. See also: Why dream of pulling hair in a dream Exactly? Why do you dream of a single man cutting hair? When you see in a dream a man or young man who is plump and standing at the hairdresser to get his hair cut, this is a sign of relief from worries and relief from pain and sadness, and God knows best. But if he sees himself in a dream complete and he is cutting his hair, this is a sign of serious problems that may occur to him. And worries and torments, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of completely gray hair in a dream? Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman’s haircut. Seeing a pregnant woman cutting her hair completely in a dream is a sign of easy pregnancy and childbirth without problems and troubles. And when you see in a dream full of long, beautiful and elegant hair, this is evidence However, she gave birth to a girl, and vice versa. If the hair is short, this indicates that the newborn is a boy, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees her husband cutting her hair, this is a sign that the problems between them will end and a new life will begin without family problems, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of completely gray hair? In a dream If you have a dream that you want to interpret, leave it in a comment below and our team will answer you.

title: I dreamed that I had a daughter. Do you know the interpretations of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a girl in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a girl giving birth in a dream? Do all visions of giving birth to girls mean good news, or do the details of the dream change its meaning? There are many secrets related to this vision that will be revealed in the following article. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Search on Google for the online dream interpretation site. I dreamed that I had a girl. If a woman gives birth to a girl in a dream, this means that all crises will be resolved and good news And good things will come soon. If a divorced woman dreams that she gave birth to a girl in a dream, the vision heralds happy days that will come true in reality. Seeing the birth of a sick girl in a dream is not good news and indicates unhappiness, constant fatigue and suffering. Seeing the birth of a girl with a strange and frightening appearance in a dream indicates Distress and the occurrence of bad life events. Al-Nabulsi said that the symbol of birth in a dream indicates the disappearance of adversity and pain, and it is better for the dreamer to give birth to a girl than to give birth to a boy, so that the vision indicates the arrival of joys and the disappearance of troubles. I dreamed that I brought a girl to Ibn Sirin. Seeing girls giving birth in a dream to Ibn Sirin indicates On prosperity and happiness. The birth of a girl with brown hair with beautiful features in a dream indicates stability and a balanced life. The birth of a girl with soft and thick hair in a dream portends to the dreamer an expansion of sustenance, blessings, and coverage in life. But if the dreamer gives birth to a girl in a dream and she dies a few moments after her birth, The dream becomes bad and explains that the dreamer will not enjoy the livelihood that will come to her because she will do so quickly. If an unmarried woman gives birth to a girl in A dream after experiencing severe pain during childbirth, this is a lot of sustenance for the dreamer after a long journey of misery and patience. The symbol of the birth of a girl in the dream of an unmarried woman can mean a happy marriage and the birth of girls and children by her next husband. Seeing the birth of a smiling baby girl in the dream of an unmarried person It indicates happy days, as the dreamer recovers from an illness, and the scene can be interpreted by finding a decent job and earning money from it, and perhaps God will give it to him. Her comfort and security and giving her the love of people. I dreamed that I gave birth to a beautiful girl while I was single. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she gave birth to a beautiful girl indicates her close marriage to a person who enjoys great justice and wealth. She will live a happy life with him and God will give her good offspring, male and female. If she sees a woman For a single woman who has never been married to give birth to a beautiful girl, this symbolizes losing the worries and sorrows that she suffered from in the previous period and enjoying a happy and stable life. For an unmarried woman to see in a dream that she gives birth to a young girl with a beautiful face means that she will achieve her dreams and aspirations that she sought so much, whether On a practical or scientific level. The birth of a beautiful girl is...

title: Interpretation of green cardamom in a dream: seeing cardamom in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Interpretation of green cardamom for a girl, single, married, pregnant, Imam Al-Sadiq, dream of ground cardamom, buying cardamom and coffee. Interpretation of cardamom in a dreamAlso known as “Habban”If you dream that you found green cardamom, if you believe in the dream, then sustenance will come to you, God willing, and peace. On you. Green cardamom seeds in a dream are beneficial to a very strange person. Cardamom indicates recovery from diseases and indicates the survival of loved ones because of its name (Han Habb). Cardamom is a beautiful thing in a dream that indicates joy and honor in this world. Seeing cardamom in a dream means a good reputation and smell among people and good morals. And love for many. Seeing cardamom is evidence of goodness, blessing, and good circumstances, because cardamom is placed in coffee and coffee is drunk on good occasions. If you dream that you are buying cardamom from someone, this means that this person speaks well of you and praises you, because cardamom has a good and sweet smell. Whoever sees in his dream that he is grinding Cardamom through a grinding machine, the dream indicates some misfortunes and dangerous situations that the dreamer falls into in his real life. However, the viewer will make great efforts to get rid of those difficult circumstances that he is going through. If the grinding machine emits an audible sound during the cardamom grinding process, the vision It indicates the difficulty of getting rid of these disasters and the harsh conditions that the dreamer is going through. If you dream that cardamom is mixed with coffee and cardamom, this may indicate the concept of love. Seeing watercress in a dream - YouTube

Interpretation of cardamom in a dreamAlso known as “Habban”If you dream that you found green cardamom, if you believe in the dream, then sustenance will come to you, God willing, and peace. On you. Green cardamom seeds in a dream are beneficial to a very strange person. Cardamom indicates recovery from diseases and indicates the survival of loved ones because of its name (Han Habb). Cardamom is a beautiful thing in a dream that indicates joy and honor in this world. Seeing cardamom in a dream means a good reputation and smell among people and good morals. And love for many. Seeing cardamom is evidence of goodness, blessing, and good circumstances, because cardamom is placed in coffee and coffee is drunk on good occasions. If you dream that you are buying cardamom from someone, this means that this person speaks well of you and praises you, because cardamom has a good and sweet smell. Whoever sees in his dream that he is grinding Cardamom through a grinding machine, the dream indicates some misfortunes and dangerous situations that the dreamer falls into in his real life. However, the viewer will make great efforts to get rid of those difficult circumstances that he is going through. If the grinding machine emits an audible sound during the cardamom grinding process, the vision It indicates the difficulty of getting rid of these disasters and the harsh conditions that the dreamer is going through. If you dream that cardamom is mixed with coffee and cardamom, this may indicate the concept of love. Seeing watercress in a dream - YouTube

title: Pear in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about a pear for a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man and a single woman

preview.html: Ladies and gentlemen, loyal to the site of dream interpretation and vision expression, hello and welcome to all of you. In this meeting, we will refer to the interpretation of pears in a dream through what is stated in the greatest Arabic books and works, which are the two books, The Interpretation of Great Dreams by Muhammad Ibn Sirin, as well as Perfuming. Animals in the interpretation of dreams by Saheb Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi in some Arab countries with armots. We wish you an enjoyable and useful continuation of this topic. Pears in a dream: Interpretation of Ibn Sirinurd The interpretation of great dreams in the book The Interpretation of Great Dreams in the forty-third chapter, which is the section devoted to expressing the meaning of fruit trees and their fruits and the interpretation of orchards, plantings, and vines. Ibn Sirin said in Al-Qamari’s interpretation of the dream: Most interpreters hate its interpretation and say that pears in a dream indicate illness and disease. Some of them say: Pears in a dream are money for the one who falls on them or eats them, because half of the word “rich” indicates wealth or wealth. It was said in the same direction: The yellow pear represents money in the event of illness or weakness, and it was also said that its tree shows non-Arab men who succeed in taking money from their families. In the same context, it was said: If a woman sees in her dream that she is carrying pears, then she will become pregnant, and if she gives birth, she will give birth to a boy. And the person who sees in his dream that he is collecting pears in baskets, boxes, or bags, then he will get a lot of money, so it is good to collect them or manage them. Pears, pears, or “hermut” in a dream / Interpretation by Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi. Pears in their season are food, or a person appears after a long absence. But not at the right time shows illness or weakness. If a sick person dreams in a dream that he is eating pears, then he will recover from his illness, God willing. Pears or pears in a woman’s dreamIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is buying pears from the market in large quantities, then this is most likely his interpretation of making a living. However, if a woman sees in her dream that she is eating or peeling a pear, then this is a benefit that the girl will experience in waking life, if the time of the dream is the time of ripening of the pears. Pears and pears in the dream of a married and pregnant woman. If a married woman sees that she is carrying large quantities of pears, the dream may be expressive of Pregnancy It has been said: Pears or pears in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate a child, and God knows best. Pears and pears in a man’s dream Pears in a man’s dream indicate wealth, and in the interpretation a sum of money. They also said: Eating pears means healing the sick and it is good, especially if the man sees He buys it, eats it, or collects it. At the right time. As for pears, when they are not at the right time, it indicates worry and anxiety, and commentators hate seeing yellow fruits at the wrong time because their yellow color indicates illness, weakness, or anxiety.

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Dukhan in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Ad-Dukhan in a dream: Hearing it in a dream and seeing the recitation of Surat Ad-Dukhan in a dream means trust in God and good deeds because it indicates victory over the enemy, and people see it in different sects in their dreams and people feel fear and anxiety when you see it. Look at Surat Ad-Dukhan in their dreams, so hurry to find an interpretation of this vision until you decide whether it is good or good or bad. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of seeing Surat Ad-Dukhan in a dreamInterpretation of seeing Surat Ad-Dukhan in a dreamThis indicates that this girl will earn a living soon. Goodness, abundance and happiness, and this is the supreme commandment of God. When a single girl dreams that she listens to Surat Ad-Dukhan. This indicates that this girl will be blessed by God Almighty to perform the Hajj to Mecca in the near future. This was an interpretation of seeing a single girl in a dream or seeing hearing Surat Al-Hajj. This indicates that this girl is a good girl with good morals. You may also be interested in the following: I saw my husband getting marriedInterpretation of a dream of seeing and hearing Surat Ad-Dukhan in a married woman's dreamThis indicates that this woman enjoys a stable and peaceful marriage. And mutual understanding with her husband and her love and tenderness. Also when I see a married woman in a dream or hear Surat Ad-Dukhan. This indicates that this woman has two husbands from her sons. They and their father are distinguished by good qualities And morals. You can also see married women in your dreams and hear Surat Ad-Dukhan. It is a great blessing that God Almighty sent immediately to this woman. Seeing and hearing Surat Ad-Dukhan in a married woman's dream indicates the peace and reassurance that she receives from God Almighty. You may also be interested in: Pumpkin in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Ad-Dukhan in a dream for a pregnant womanSeeing or hearing a pregnant woman in a dream about Surat Ad-Dukhan will warn her. What she did and left with some sins and injustice to get closer to God. However, seeing a pregnant woman in a dream or hearing that Surat Ad-Dukhan is pregnant means that she is pregnant. There are many people showing affection for this pregnant woman. In fact, those behind her are the enemy and the hypocrite and have insulted her. You should pay attention to all these people. And when the pregnant woman heard Surat Ad-Dukhan in a dream. This indicates that this woman will go through a pregnancy period that pleases God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing and hearing Surat Ad-Dukhan in a dream for a divorced womanSeeing and hearing Surat Ad-Dukhan in a dream for a divorced woman is a sign, in the near future, this woman expects a large expense from a generous provider. Interpretation of dreams to see smoke in dreams MenThe interpretation of what you see and hear in Surat Ad-Dukhan differs for men than for women. This is because the interpretation of men’s vision differs from the interpretation of women’s vision. When I saw and heard Surat Ad-Dukhan in my dreams, the man turned to it. That this person will earn a lot of living or get a job. Expect a prestigious position in society. title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing the sea descending in a dream and its effects

preview.html: I dream that I am descending into the sea in a dream and the interpretation of descending into the sea in a dream is one of the visions that many people may see in their dreams, which have many interpretations, and this is due to the person’s condition and the form of the vision that he saw in his dream, as the sea in a dream can combine goodness, food or... Damage and problems, and through the following lines we will learn about the best interpretations that came when you see the sea descending in a dream. Interpretation of the sea falling in a dream for a man When a person sees the sea in general in a dream, this means abundance of wealth and goodness, and it is a sign of a bright future. And if he sees himself descending To the sea and roam in it, this indicates that he will get married - God willing - soon, and this is if he is single and if he is married, this indicates that he will have great goodness. . A lot of money will come to him in the coming period of his life. Interpretation of the dream of going down to the sea and washing it. If he sees that he is going down to it and washing himself with its water, this is evidence that God will ease his anxiety and remove his distress and that his condition will improve for the better in reality, and if he is sick, so will he. It indicates that he will recover from his illness and illness quickly. And when the dreamer sees that he is diving into the depths of the sea, he will obtain a lot of money and profit in his life, where he did not count. As for seeing him drowning in it, it is a sign of the many worries and problems that the dreamer suffers from, and the difficulty of achieving the things that he Dreaming about her and not getting her wishes. An Egyptian specialized website that includes a group of leading translators of dreams and visions in the Arab world. Interpretation of the sea falling in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a woman swimming and floating on herself is a sign for her to achieve the ambitions and dreams that she was seeking to achieve, and in the dream it is also evidence of She thinks about many things and feels confused about them. If you see her washing with water, this means that she will get rid of her worries and problems, and if she has problems with her husband, they will be resolved soon, and this is evidence of her repentance as well. Of her sins, and forgiveness for her from God Almighty. Sources:- 1- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi, Al-Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 2- Book of Selected Sayings on the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad ibn Sirin, Dar al-Ma’rifa, Beirut. 2000.

title: What if I dreamed that my sister had twins?  What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation?  I dreamed that my sister was traveling with twins, a boy and a girl, and I dreamed that my sister was traveling with twins

preview.html: I dreamed that my sister had twins. The birth of twins in the vision is considered one of the characteristics that makes a person feel that the food that will come to him from God - Glory be to Him - will be dense and double. What are the interpretations of a dream about my sister walking around with twins? We will continue along the following lines. I dreamed that my sister had twins. The birth of twins is interpreted by desirable signs. Experts say that it is a symbol of the continuation of happy things in the life of the fortuneteller or the woman who seems to be giving birth to twins, especially if it is the birth of beautiful girls. Interpretation scholars foretell the dreamer’s sister the presence of good and positive things in Her reality is when the sleeper sees that she is giving birth to two dazzling girls and rejoices over them in a dream. I dreamed that my sister gave birth to twins according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a sister giving birth to twins is one of the symbols that highlights intense peace of heart and escape from many material obstacles, and this is with their good health and not getting sick or crying. A dream. Whereas if the sister is married and the sleeper finds that she has given birth to twins, the interpretation may warn her of the possibility of pregnancy soon, God willing, but sometimes the dream warns her and shows her her difficult fate if the twins are exposed to that. Danger when they are born and finds the death of one or both of them. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google’s online dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type Dream Interpretation Site. I dreamed that My sister gave birth to unmarried twins: A dream about a sister giving birth to twins for an unmarried woman is interpreted by the presence of great happiness in her personal life, as the meaning represents a good message about freedom from sad events and her idea of ​​leaving a relationship that is harmful and harmful to her. Where she was able to find a good partner who suits her and reassures him. However, if the girl finds that her sister gave birth to severely disabled twins, then the dream turns to her and her sister, as the dreamer herself is on days when she does not feel psychologically balanced, but rather is stressed, and the issue could be the result of a major mistake she commits. She must quickly avoid what she is doing, in addition to the presence of many sad consequences and issues, in her sister’s life, especially if she is married. I dreamed that my sister gave birth to married twins. The meaning of twins in a dream carries many noble issues. When the dreamer sees her sister giving birth to twins, the sister is In a happy life after this dream, because childbirth appears after sadness and irresponsibility towards the sister. And to succeed and be able to escape from some of the burdens that afflict her with strength and anxiety. The sister can begin to change many of the habits that she accepts to practice on a daily basis by seeing her sister giving birth to twins, because the dream shows the beginning of practicing the right life and abandoning many thoughts, sorrows, and some evils. Practices: I dreamed that my sister was pregnant with twins. If the sister was single and her pregnant sister saw that she was giving birth to twins, the meaning is an interpretation of the feelings and thoughts of the pregnant woman at the time of birth, and thus she sees her sister pregnant with twins, except for the many missionaries that her unmarried sister accepts and what she earns from
